basicInfo.notes: Founded 2013 in Sofia, Bulgaria by Terry Kyle and Georgi Petrov. Originally called Traffic Planet Hosting, rebranded to WPX in 2016. Known for 30-second average support response time. Custom XDN CDN with 41 endpoints. Trustpilot 5.0 stars (3,586 reviews). Uses LiteSpeed Server + LiteSpeed Cache + OpCache. Every Dog Matters nonprofit initiative for animal welfare.

policiesOverages.bandwidthOveragePolicy: Bandwidth-based pricing (NOT visitor-based); no visitor caps; no overage fees
policiesOverages.resourceAbuseDefinition: Excessive resource usage beyond plan limits
policiesOverages.hiddenFeesNotes: No renewal price hikes; No hidden fees; Bandwidth-based pricing (not visitor-based like competitors); Express migration $100; Custom XDN CDN included free; Free business email (50 mailboxes) included; WordPress-only; Limited to 3 data centers; No SSH access; Max 60GB storage on highest plan

contentRestrictions.contentNotes: WordPress-only hosting; Standard content policies apply

editorial.bestFor: WordPress bloggers and content sites; Speed-focused WordPress users; Sites needing 30-second support response; Users wanting no renewal price hikes; WooCommerce stores under 60GB
editorial.avoidIf: Need SSH access; Need more than 60GB storage; Need global data center options; Running high-traffic news sites; Need Redis/advanced caching; Budget-conscious beginners
editorial.competitorComparisonNotes: Trustpilot 5.0 with 3,586 reviews - exceptional rating; 30-second average support response; Custom XDN CDN with 41 endpoints; No renewal price increases; Competes with Kinsta, Rocket.net, Cloudways; Free unlimited email included unlike many managed WP hosts

comparisonData.uniqueSellingPoint: 30-second average support response with Trustpilot 5.0 rating and no renewal price increases
comparisonData.idealCustomerProfile: WordPress blogger or content creator wanting lightning-fast support and transparent pricing without renewal surprises

faqContent.faqIsThisHostGood: WPX is excellent for WordPress with Trustpilot 5.0 (3,586 reviews). Known for 30-second average support response and custom XDN CDN with 41 global endpoints.
faqContent.faqWhoOwnsThisHost: WPX Hosting is an independent company founded in 2013 by Terry Kyle and Georgi Petrov in Sofia, Bulgaria. Originally called Traffic Planet Hosting.
faqContent.faqHowMuchDoesItCost: Business plan $24.99/month (5 sites, 15GB). Professional $49.99/month (15 sites, 30GB). Elite $99/month (35 sites, 60GB). Annual billing saves 2 months.
faqContent.faqIsItBeginnerFriendly: Yes, simple dashboard with 24/7 live chat and 30-second average response times. One-click WordPress install and free migrations.
faqContent.faqDoesItIncludeEmail: Yes, WPX includes unlimited free business email accounts with all plans - unlike many managed WordPress hosts.
faqContent.faqCanIHostWordPress: Yes, WPX is WordPress-only hosting with LiteSpeed, staging, automatic updates, and custom XDN CDN.
faqContent.faqWhatsTheUptime: WPX guarantees 99.95% uptime with SLA credits for any downtime.
faqContent.faqCanICancelAnytime: Yes, 30-day money-back guarantee. Monthly billing available with no long-term contracts.
